This game is WICKED if you like guns and bang also a lot of fun! 
The best thing with the game is that you can play it alone, with friends, with friends from all over the WORLD. 
You can join tournaments with you're m8ts or other missions in game, you can even get skins for you're favorite rifle or what ever. 
Its also an ranking system that make sure you will play against same level as you're self:) 
You will set you're reflex and brain on test :D  

Enjoy this awsome game!  
Best regards
